- feature: Add new feature or enhancement
- bug: Fix a bug or error
- chore: Changes that don't affect code behavior (comments, formatting, renaming)

- test: Add, update, or remove tests
- docs: Update documentation (README, comments, API docs)
- ci: Update CI/CD pipelines, workflows, or dependencies
-->
